name: PHISH FOTOGRAFY
description:
Phish Fotografy is a chill game about walking around on the ocean floor and taking pictures of made-up fish. 

It was made in 48 hours for Creative Assembly's internal game jam in 2021. 

Controls:

  • Move - W/A/S/D
  • Take Photo - Left Mouse Button

If you didn't get "a good enough photo", try getting closer and centering the fish in your photo.

Each fish has two description messages; one that appears after you've taken the fish's first picture, and another when special conditions have been met (in most cases it's having taken 5 pictures of the fish).
